title: NASA welcomes first Isro astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla to International Space Station
Fears of Middle East war grow after Hamas leader's killing
content: Tensions surged in the Middle East as Iran and allies prepared to retaliate for the assassination of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh, blamed on Israel. The US is deploying military assets to support Israel. Iran's allies and Hezbollah have vowed revenge, raising fears of a wider regional conflict. Western governments advised citizens to leave Lebanon.
summary: Tensions surged in the Middle East as Iran and allies prepared to retaliate for the assassination of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh, blamed on Israel. The US is deploying military assets to support Israel. Iran's allies and Hezbollah have vowed revenge, raising fears of a wider regional conflict. Western governments advised citizens to leave Lebanon.

title: Violent protests in UK: Over 90 arrested as far-right demonstrations turn into riots
UK government vows 'consequences' for far-right rioters
content: The UK government condemned recent violent disorder after police arrested dozens of people during far-right rallies. The unrest, sparked by false rumors about a mass stabbing that killed three young girls, spread across several cities. Prime Minister Keir Starmer vowed strict action against the perpetrators and backed the police to maintain public safety.
summary: The UK government condemned recent violent disorder after police arrested dozens of people during far-right rallies. The unrest, sparked by false rumors about a mass stabbing that killed three young girls, spread across several cities. Prime Minister Keir Starmer vowed strict action against the perpetrators and backed the police to maintain public safety.

France calls on citizens in Lebanon to leave 'as soon as possible'
content: France urged its citizens in Lebanon to leave immediately due to increasing fears of an all-out war between Israel and Hezbollah. The foreign ministry noted the availability of commercial flights for departure. Sweden also closed its embassy in Beirut, following similar advisories from the US and UK, amid regional tensions.
summary: France urged its citizens in Lebanon to leave immediately due to increasing fears of an all-out war between Israel and Hezbollah. The foreign ministry noted the availability of commercial flights for departure. Sweden also closed its embassy in Beirut, following similar advisories from the US and UK, amid regional tensions.

title: Google, Netflix, and OpenAI execs back Harris with high-profile fundraiser
Woman killed, 3 others wounded in a stabbing attack in Israel
content: A woman in her 70s was killed and three others injured in a stabbing incident in Holon, a Tel Aviv suburb. The attacker, reportedly from the West Bank, was neutralised by Israeli police. The incident comes amid heightened regional tensions following recent conflicts involving Hamas and Hezbollah. Medical personnel reported the other victims include two elderly men in critical conditions and a younger man moderately injured.
summary: A woman in her 70s was killed and three others injured in a stabbing incident in Holon, a Tel Aviv suburb. The attacker, reportedly from the West Bank, was neutralised by Israeli police. The incident comes amid heightened regional tensions following recent conflicts involving Hamas and Hezbollah. Medical personnel reported the other victims include two elderly men in critical conditions and a younger man moderately injured.

title: Watch video: Uber driver in New York claims racist attack as passenger pepper sprays him ‘because he’s brown’
'Life-threatening' Tropical Storm Debby takes aim at Florida's Gulf Coast
content: Tropical Storm Debby, expected to become a life-threatening hurricane, hit Gulf Coast waters and moved north along Florida's coast. The storm, which sparked evacuation orders, was forecast to bring heavy rain, high surf, and storm surges. Governor DeSantis mobilized the National Guard to prepare for its impacts, expected to follow a path similar to Hurricane Ian in 2022.
summary: Tropical Storm Debby, expected to become a life-threatening hurricane, hit Gulf Coast waters and moved north along Florida's coast.
